personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate web developer, making useful application using the latest technologies!

degrees.name: B.E. in Computer Engineering
descriptions: Coursework: Programming and Software Development(C, JAVA, Python); Computer Networking; Theory Of Computations; DBMS;Software Engineering(Agile and Waterflow methods)

responsabilities: As a Front-end Developer, I contribute to the development of applications for Web and TV platforms. My responsibilities include implementing user interfaces, optimizing performance, and ensuring seamless user experiences. Icollaborate closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality web applications and also that application compiled to run on TV
In this time period learn the technologies in which Ruby On Rails(ROR) and React.

In the period of ROR training, i worked on project in which i've done email integration according to subscription selected by user with cronjob, Created API for download data of Payment Due for admin side.
In the period of React training, i used programming skills to build React(javascript based) application with excellent user experience
Builing a Online Book Selling Platform for Customer and Buyer to Smoothly purchase book online.
Project is build with help of React for front-end , also using Materialize-CSS for styling, Authentication using JWT and Moreover NodeJs and MongoDB for back-end.

projectsInfo.name: Project Sphere
projectsInfo.description: Project Sphere is a robust web application (build on the top of Ruby On Rails) designed to streamline project management processes and enhance collaboration within teams. It provides a comprehensive set of features to efficiently plan , organize projects, ensuring successful project delivery.

projectsInfo.name: Resume React Template
projectsInfo.description: In this project, I made a simple and customizable template with multilanguage support (i18n)
